description: This is a Vite + React + TS app

hero.title: Keyoshi Project
hero.subtitle: Open Source. Open Story. Bringing Avatar: The Last Airbender chronicles to Hebrew speakers.

about.title: Keyoshi Project
about.content: It is an open-source initiative dedicated to translating the Avatar: The Last Airbender chronicles into Hebrew. Our goal is to make these beloved stories accessible to Hebrew speakers everywhere, powered by community collaboration and a love for the Avatar universe.

feature1.title: Open Source
feature1.description: All translations and code are public and free to use.

feature2.title: Community Driven
feature2.description: Collaborate with fans and linguists worldwide.

feature3.title: Faithful Translations
feature3.description: Preserving the spirit and nuance of the original stories.

feature4.title: For Fans, By Fans
feature4.description: A project built by Avatar fans for the Hebrew-speaking community.

testimonial1.name: Jane Doe
testimonial1.quote: This project is a gift to the Avatar community! The Hebrew translations are top-notch.

testimonial2.name: John Smith
testimonial2.quote: Open source, open story. I love contributing to something meaningful.

testimonial3.name: Emily Chen
testimonial3.quote: Translating the Avatar chronicles to Hebrew is a dream come true!

callToAction.title: Ready to join the journey?
callToAction.subtitle: Join us and help bring the Avatar stories to more fans!
